00018   const char *HistMgr::__typeName[HistMgr::kNTypes]={
00019     "1D",
00020     "2D",
00021     "Profile",
00022     "Graph"

00024 
00025   HistMgr::ECollectionType HistMgr::findType(const std::string &type_name) {
00026     for (unsigned int type_i=0; type_i<kNTypes; type_i++) {
00027       if (type_name.compare(__typeName[type_i])==0) return static_cast<ECollectionType>(type_i);
00028     }
00029     return kNTypes;
00030   }

00034 UInt_t HistMgr::__instanceCounter=0;
00035 Glib::StaticMutex HistMgr::_histogramListLock = GLIBMM_STATIC_MUTEX_INIT;
00036 #endif

00038 HistMgr::~HistMgr() 
00039 {
00040 #ifdef HAVE_CALICEGUI
00041   Glib::Mutex::Lock lock (_histogramListLock);
00042 #endif
00043   if (this == __histMgr) {
00044     __histMgr=0;
00045   }
00046   
00047   //  for_each ( _histogramGroupList.begin(), _histogramGroupList.end() )
00048   // delete all the histogram collections
00049   //  for (HistogramList_t::iterator col_iter=_histograms.begin();
00050   //       col_iter!=_histograms.end();
00051   //       col_iter++) {
00052   //    col_iter->second.deleteCollection();
00053   //  }
00054 
00055   // delete registered Histogram writer
00056   for (std::map<std::string,HistWriterKit *>::iterator iter=_writerKitList.begin();
00057        iter!=_writerKitList.end();
00058        iter++) {
00059     delete iter->second;
00060     iter->second=0;
00061   };
00062 }
00063 
00064 bool HistMgr::hasLockedGroups() const
00065 {
00066   for (HistogramGroupList_t::const_iterator group_iter=_histogramGroupList.begin();
00067        group_iter!=_histogramGroupList.end();
00068        group_iter++) {
00069     if ( (*group_iter).header().isReferenced()) {
00070       return true;
00071     }
00072   }
00073   return false;
00074 }
00075 
00076 
00077 void HistMgr::deleteInstance() 
00078 {
00079   if (!__histMgr) return;
00080   
00081 #ifdef HAVE_CALICEGUI
00082   if (!__histMgr->isUnused()) {
00083     __histMgr->_deleteIfUnused=true;
00084     return;
00085   }
00086 #endif
00087   
00088   if (__histMgr->hasLockedGroups()) {
00089 #ifdef HAVE_CALICEGUI
00090     __histMgr->_deleteIfUnused=true;
00091 #endif
00092     return;
00093   }
00094   
00095 #ifdef HAVE_CALICEGUI
00096   __instanceCounter--;
00097 #endif
00098   delete __histMgr; __histMgr=0;
00099 }
00100 
00101 void HistMgr::unlockGroup(const Key_t &group_key) {
00102   {
00103 #ifdef HAVE_CALICEGUI
00104     Glib::Mutex::Lock lock (_histogramListLock);
00105 #endif
00106     _histogramGroupList[group_key].header().unref();
00107   }
00108 
00109 
00110 #ifdef HAVE_CALICEGUI
00111   if (_deleteIfUnused) {
00112     deleteInstance();
00113   }
00114 #endif
00115 }
00116 
00117 lcio::LCCollection *HistMgr::createHistograms(const Key_t &group_key, const Key_t &collection_key, 
00118                                               const EVENT::StringVec &name_list, UInt_t n_hist, 
00119                                               const HistPar &par,
00120                                               bool may_overwrite) 
00121   throw (std::bad_alloc, std::runtime_error)
00122 {
00123   if (histogramGroupExists(group_key) && histogramGroup(group_key).histogramCollectionExists(collection_key) && may_overwrite==false) {
00124     std::stringstream message;
00125     message << "ERROR:: HistMgr::createHistograms> Histogram collection " 
00126             << collection_key.name() 
00127             << " does already exist." << std::endl;
00128     throw std::runtime_error(message.str());
00129   }
00130   HistogramCollection_t *histogram_col=new HistogramCollection_t(collection_key.name(),name_list,n_hist,par);
00131 
00132   {
00133 #ifdef HAVE_CALICEGUI
00134     Glib::Mutex::Lock lock (_histogramListLock);
00135 #endif
00136     getOrCreatehistogramGroup(group_key).setHistogramCollection(collection_key,histogram_col);
00137   }
00138   return histogramGroup(group_key).histogramCollection(collection_key).collection();
00139 }

00269 
00270 void HistMgr::assignFileName(const Key_t &group_key, const std::string &file_name, const std::string &folder_name)
00271 {
00272   if (!_writerKit && _writerKitList.empty()) {
00273     std::cerr << "HistMgr::writeHistograms> WARNINING: There are currently no histogram writers registered." << std::endl
00274               << "No histograms will be written!" << std::endl;
00275 
00276   }
00277 
00278   if (!histogramGroupExists(group_key)) {
00279     std::cerr << "HistMgr::writeHistograms> ERROR: the group " << group_key.name() << " does not exist." << std::endl;
00280   }
00281   else {
00282     HistogramGroupData_t &group=histogramGroup(group_key).header();
00283     if (group.fileName().empty()) {
00284       group.ref();
00285     }
00286     group.setFileName(file_name)
00287       .setFolderName(folder_name);
00288   }
00289 }
00290 
00291 void HistMgr::writeHistograms(bool snapshot)
00292 {
00293   for (HistogramGroupList_t::iterator group_iter=_histogramGroupList.begin();
00294        group_iter!=_histogramGroupList.end();
00295        group_iter++) {
00296     Group_t &group=(*group_iter);
00297     if (!group.header().fileName().empty()) {
00298       writeHistograms(group,group_iter.name(),snapshot);
00299       if (!snapshot) {
00300         group.header().unref();
00301       }
00302     }
00303   }
00304 }
00305 
00306 void HistMgr::warnOnUnassigned()
00307 {
00308   for (HistogramGroupList_t::iterator group_iter=_histogramGroupList.begin();
00309        group_iter!=_histogramGroupList.end();
00310        group_iter++) {
00311     if ((*group_iter).header().fileName().empty()) {
00312       std::cerr << "HistMgr::warnOnUnassigned> No output file assigned to histogram group " << group_iter.name() << std::endl;
00313     }
00314   }
00315 }
00316 
00317 void HistMgr::fillGroupList(std::vector<std::string> &dest_group_list) const
00318 {
00319   dest_group_list.clear();
00320 #ifdef HAVE_CALICEGUI
00321   Glib::Mutex::Lock lock (_histogramListLock);
00322   // FIXME: This function is called e.g. by the GUI from an other thread. To make sure
00323   // that the instance still exists:
00324   if (!__histMgr) return;
00325   // 
00326 #endif
00327   for (HistogramGroupList_t::const_iterator group_iter=_histogramGroupList.begin();
00328        group_iter!=_histogramGroupList.end();
00329        group_iter++) {
00330     for (UInt_t type_i=0; type_i<kNTypes; type_i++) {
00331       if ((*group_iter).hasCollection(static_cast<ECollectionType>( type_i) )) {
00332         std::stringstream full_name;
00333         full_name << group_iter.name()
00334                   << " -- "
00335                   << __typeName[type_i];
00336         
00337         dest_group_list.push_back( full_name.str() );
00338       }
00339     }
00340   }
00341 }
00342 
00343 std::pair<std::string, HistMgr::ECollectionType> HistMgr::getGroupNameAndCollectionType(const std::string &full_name)
00344 {
00345     std::string::size_type type_pos=full_name.rfind(" -- ");
00346     histmgr::HistMgr::ECollectionType type=histmgr::HistMgr::kNTypes;
00347     if (type_pos!=std::string::npos) {
00348       std::string type_name(full_name,type_pos+4,full_name.size()-type_pos-4);
00349       type=histmgr::HistMgr::findType(type_name);
00350     }
00351     return make_pair(std::string(full_name,0,type_pos),type);
00352 }
00353 
00354 void HistMgr::fillHistogramCollectionList(const Key_t &group_key, 
00355                                           ECollectionType type, 
00356                                           std::vector<std::string> &dest_histogram_collection_list) const
00357 {
00358   dest_histogram_collection_list.clear();
00359 #ifdef HAVE_CALICEGUI
00360   Glib::Mutex::Lock lock (_histogramListLock);
00361   // FIXME: This function is called e.g. by the GUI from an other thread. To make sure
00362   // that the instance still exists:
00363   if (!__histMgr) return;
00364   // 
00365 #endif
00366 
00367   if (!histogramGroupExists(group_key)) {
00368     std::cerr << "HistMgr::fillHistogramCollectionList> ERROR: the group " << group_key.name() << "does not exist." << std::endl;
00369   }
00370   else {
00371     const Group_t &group=histogramGroup(group_key);
00372 
00373     // TODO: need to change design such that all supported histogram, graph collections derive from the same base
00374     //       class which provides the same interface to create 1d and 2d collections, and to find out whether the
00375     //       collection is empty
00376 
00377     std::pair<KeyMapBase_t::NameMap_t::const_iterator, KeyMapBase_t::NameMap_t::const_iterator> limits=group.nameListIterators(type);
00378     for (KeyMapBase_t::NameMap_t::const_iterator col_iter=limits.first;
00379          col_iter!=limits.second;
00380          col_iter++) {
00381 
00382       histmgr::Key_t element_key=KeyMapBase_t::createKey(col_iter);
00383       unsigned int n_elements=0;
00384       switch (type) {
00385       case kH1:
00386         n_elements=group.histogramCollection(element_key).n();
00387         break;
00388       case kH2:
00389         n_elements=group.histogram2DCollection(element_key).n();
00390         break;
00391       case kProfile:
00392         n_elements=group.profileCollection(element_key).n();
00393         break;
00394       case kGraph:
00395         n_elements=group.graphCollection(element_key).n();
00396         break;
00397       default:
00398         break;
00399       }
00400 
00401       if (n_elements>0) {
00402         dest_histogram_collection_list.push_back(col_iter->first);
00403       }
00404     }
00405   }
00406 }
00407 
00408 
00409 Double_t HistMgr::getNEntriesTotal(const Key_t &group_key) const
00410 {
00411   Double_t entries=0.;
00412 
00413   if (histogramGroupExists(group_key)) {
00414     const Group_t &group=histogramGroup(group_key);
00415     
00416     for (HistogramList_t::const_iterator col_iter=group._histogramList.begin();
00417          col_iter!=group._histogramList.end();
00418          col_iter++) {
00419       const HistogramCollection_t &hist_col=*(*col_iter);
00420       // warn if the histogram collection does not contain histograms
00421       if (hist_col.n()>0) {
00422         if (hist_col.is2D()) {
00423           for (UInt_t major_i=0; major_i<(UInt_t) hist_col.nMajor(); major_i++) {
00424             for (UInt_t hist_i=0; hist_i<(UInt_t) hist_col.nMinor(major_i); hist_i++) {
00425               const FloatHistogram1D *a_hist=hist_col.histogram(major_i,hist_i);
00426               entries+=a_hist->entries();
00427             }
00428           }
00429         }
00430         else {
00431           for (UInt_t hist_i=0; hist_i<(UInt_t) hist_col.n(); hist_i++) {
00432             const FloatHistogram1D *a_hist=hist_col.histogram(hist_i);
00433             entries+=a_hist->entries();
00434           }
00435         }
00436       }
00437     }
00438   }
00439   return entries;
00440 }
00441   
00442   void HistMgr::writeHistograms(const Key_t &group_key, bool snapshot)
00443   {
00444     if (histogramGroupExists(group_key)) {
00445       std::cerr << "HistMgr::writeHistograms> ERROR: the group " << group_key.name() << "does not exist." << std::endl;
00446     }
00447     else {
00448       Group_t &group=histogramGroup(group_key);
00449       writeHistograms(group,group_key.name(),snapshot);
00450     }
00451   }
00452 
00453 
00454 void HistMgr::writeHistograms(Group_t &group, const std::string &group_name, bool snapshot)
00455 {
00456   if (!_writerKit || group.header().fileName().empty()) return;
00457 
00458   std::string folder_name;
00459   //  std::string file_name=group.header().fileName();
00460   if (snapshot || group.header().version()>0) {
00461     std::stringstream folder_name_with_version;
00462     if (group.header().folderName().empty()){
00463       if (snapshot) {
00464         folder_name_with_version << "snapshot_" << group.header().version();
00465       }
00466     }
00467     else {
00468       folder_name_with_version << group.header().folderName() << "_" << group.header().version();
00469     }
00470     folder_name=folder_name_with_version.str();
00471   }
00472   else {
00473     folder_name=group.header().folderName();
00474   }
00475   
00476   HistWriter *writer=0;
00477   
00478   // for fast access the histogram collections are stored in a map.
00479   // During histogram creating the map structure changes. Thus, it is no
00480   // so easy to maintain an index of all histogram which belong to a certain 
00481   // group.
00482   // So, the whole list of histograms is worked through and all histograms 
00483   // which have the requested group_id are written.
00484 
00485   UInt_t n_histograms=0;
00486   UInt_t n_graphs=0;
00487   bool first=true;
00488   for (HistogramList_t::iterator col_iter=group._histogramList.begin();
00489        col_iter!=group._histogramList.end();
00490        col_iter++) {
00491 
00492     HistogramCollection_t &hist_col=*(*col_iter);
00493     if (hist_col.n()==0) {
00494       std::cerr << "HistMgr::writeHistograms> Histogram collection " << col_iter.name()
00495                 << " is empty." << std::endl;
00496       continue;
00497     }
00498 
00499     
00500     // the file is only created if the group contains at least one histogram;
00501     if (!writer) {
00502       writer=_writerKit->createWriter(group.header().fileName());
00503       if (!folder_name.empty()) {
00504         writer->enterDir(folder_name,true);
00505       }
00506     }
00507       
00508     writer->enterDir(col_iter.name(),true);
00509 
00510     UInt_t n_hists_written=0;
00511     UInt_t n_empty_hists_written=0;
00512     if (hist_col.is2D()) {
00513       for (UInt_t major_i=0; major_i<(UInt_t) hist_col.nMajor(); major_i++) {
00514         for (UInt_t hist_i=0; hist_i<(UInt_t) hist_col.nMinor(major_i); hist_i++) {
00515           const FloatHistogram1D *a_hist=hist_col.histogram(major_i,hist_i);
00516           if (a_hist->entries()>0) {
00517             n_hists_written++;
00518           }
00519           else {
00520             n_empty_hists_written++;
00521           }
00522           std::stringstream message;
00523           std::string full_name(hist_col.getName(major_i));
00524           std::string::size_type base_name_end_i=full_name.find("::");
00525           if (base_name_end_i==std::string::npos || base_name_end_i+2>=full_name.size()) {
00526             base_name_end_i=0;
00527           }
00528           else {
00529             base_name_end_i+=2;
00530           }
00531           message << full_name.substr(base_name_end_i,full_name.size()-base_name_end_i)
00532                   << "_"
00533                   << major_i
00534                   << "_"
00535                   << hist_i; 
00536           writer->writeToCurrentDir(*a_hist,message.str());
00537         }
00538       }
00539     }
00540     else {
00541       for (UInt_t hist_i=0; hist_i<(UInt_t) hist_col.n(); hist_i++) {
00542         const FloatHistogram1D *a_hist=hist_col.histogram(hist_i);
00543         if (a_hist->entries()>0) {
00544           n_hists_written++;
00545         }
00546         else {
00547           n_empty_hists_written++;
00548         }
00549         std::stringstream message;
00550         std::string full_name(hist_col.getName(hist_i));
00551         std::string::size_type base_name_end_i=full_name.find("::");
00552         if (base_name_end_i==std::string::npos || base_name_end_i+2>=full_name.size()) {
00553           base_name_end_i=0;
00554         }
00555         else {
00556           base_name_end_i+=2;
00557         }
00558         message << full_name.substr(base_name_end_i,full_name.size()-base_name_end_i)
00559                 << "_"
00560                 << hist_i; 
00561         writer->writeToCurrentDir(*a_hist,message.str());
00562       }
00563     }
00564     
00565     if (n_hists_written + n_empty_hists_written>0) {
00566       if (first ) {
00567         std::cout << "Written Histograms:" << std::endl;
00568         first=false;
00569       }
00570       
00571       std::cout << "\t" << group_name << ":" << n_hists_written + n_empty_hists_written   
00572                 <<  " (no entries =" << n_empty_hists_written << ")" << std::endl;
00573     }
00574       
00575     n_histograms+=hist_col.n();
00576     
00577     writer->upDir();
00578     //    if (!folder_name.empty()) {
00579     //      writer->upDir();
00580     //    }
00581   }
00582 
00583 
00584   UInt_t n_2d_histograms=0;
00585   for (Histogram2DList_t::iterator col_iter=group._histogram2DList.begin();
00586        col_iter!=group._histogram2DList.end();
00587        col_iter++) {
00588 
00589     Histogram2DCollection_t &hist_col=*(*col_iter);
00590     if (hist_col.n()==0) {
00591       std::cerr << "HistMgr::writeHistograms> 2D Histogram collection " << col_iter.name()
00592                 << " is empty." << std::endl;
00593       continue;
00594     }
00595 
00596     
00597     // the file is only created if the group contains at least one histogram;
00598     if (!writer) {
00599       writer=_writerKit->createWriter(group.header().fileName());
00600       if (!folder_name.empty()) {
00601         writer->enterDir(folder_name,true);
00602       }
00603     }
00604       
00605     writer->enterDir(col_iter.name(),true);
00606 
00607     UInt_t n_hists_written=0;
00608     UInt_t n_empty_hists_written=0;
00609     if (hist_col.is2D()) {
00610       for (UInt_t major_i=0; major_i<(UInt_t) hist_col.nMajor(); major_i++) {
00611         for (UInt_t hist_i=0; hist_i<(UInt_t) hist_col.nMinor(major_i); hist_i++) {
00612           const FloatHistogram2D *a_hist=hist_col.histogram(major_i,hist_i);
00613           if (a_hist->entries()>0) {
00614             n_hists_written++;
00615           }
00616           else {
00617             n_empty_hists_written++;
00618           }
00619           std::stringstream message;
00620           std::string full_name(hist_col.getName(major_i));
00621           std::string::size_type base_name_end_i=full_name.find("::");
00622           if (base_name_end_i==std::string::npos || base_name_end_i+2>=full_name.size()) {
00623             base_name_end_i=0;
00624           }
00625           else {
00626             base_name_end_i+=2;
00627           }
00628           message << full_name.substr(base_name_end_i,full_name.size()-base_name_end_i)
00629                   << "_"
00630                   << major_i
00631                   << "_"
00632                   << hist_i; 
00633           writer->writeToCurrentDir(*a_hist,message.str());
00634         }
00635       }
00636     }
00637     else {
00638       for (UInt_t hist_i=0; hist_i<(UInt_t) hist_col.n(); hist_i++) {
00639         const FloatHistogram2D *a_hist=hist_col.histogram(hist_i);
00640         if (a_hist->entries()>0) {
00641           n_hists_written++;
00642         }
00643         else {
00644           n_empty_hists_written++;
00645         }
00646         std::stringstream message;
00647         std::string full_name(hist_col.getName(hist_i));
00648         std::string::size_type base_name_end_i=full_name.find("::");
00649         if (base_name_end_i==std::string::npos || base_name_end_i+2>=full_name.size()) {
00650           base_name_end_i=0;
00651         }
00652         else {
00653           base_name_end_i+=2;
00654         }
00655         message << full_name.substr(base_name_end_i,full_name.size()-base_name_end_i)
00656                 << "_"
00657                 << hist_i; 
00658         writer->writeToCurrentDir(*a_hist,message.str());
00659       }
00660     }
00661     
00662     if (n_hists_written + n_empty_hists_written>0) {
00663       if (first ) {
00664         std::cout << "Written Histograms:" << std::endl;
00665         first=false;
00666       }
00667       
00668       std::cout << "\t" << group_name << ":" << n_hists_written + n_empty_hists_written   
00669                 <<  " (no entries =" << n_empty_hists_written << ")" << std::endl;
00670     }
00671       
00672     n_2d_histograms+=hist_col.n();
00673     
00674     writer->upDir();
00675     //    if (!folder_name.empty()) {
00676     //      writer->upDir();
00677     //    }
00678   }
00679 
00680   for (GraphList_t::iterator col_iter=group._graphList.begin();
00681        col_iter!=group._graphList.end();
00682        col_iter++) {
00683 
00684     GraphCollection_t &graph_col=*(*col_iter);
00685     if (graph_col.n()==0) {
00686       std::cerr << "HistMgr::writeHistograms> Histogram collection " << col_iter.name()
00687                 << " is empty." << std::endl;
00688       continue;
00689     }
00690 
00691     // the file is only created if the group contains at least one histogram;
00692     if (!writer) {
00693       writer=_writerKit->createWriter(group.header().fileName());
00694       if (!folder_name.empty()) {
00695         writer->enterDir(folder_name,true);
00696       }
00697     }
00698       
00699     writer->enterDir(col_iter.name(),true);
00700     
00701     UInt_t n_graphs_written=0;
00702     UInt_t n_empty_graphs_written=0;
00703 
00704     EVENT::LCGenericObject *array_x=graph_col.getXArray();
00705 
00706     if (graph_col.is2D()) {
00707       for (UInt_t major_i=0; major_i<(UInt_t) graph_col.nMajor(); major_i++) {
00708         for (UInt_t minor_i=0; minor_i<(UInt_t) graph_col.nMinor(major_i); minor_i++) {
00709           std::stringstream graph_name;
00710           graph_name << graph_col.getName(major_i)
00711                      << "_"
00712                      << major_i
00713                      << "_"
00714                      << minor_i; 
00715 
00716           for (unsigned int type_i=0; type_i<graph_col.nTypes(); type_i++) {
00717             std::stringstream full_name;
00718             full_name << graph_name.str()
00719                       << "_"
00720                       << graph_col.getTypeName(type_i);
00721 
00722             if (type_i+1<graph_col.nTypes() && graph_col.getTypeName(type_i+1)=="rms") {
00723               writer->writeToCurrentDir(array_x, 
00724                                         graph_col.getArray(graph_col.getIndex(major_i,minor_i,type_i)),
00725                                         graph_col.getArray(graph_col.getIndex(major_i,minor_i,type_i+1)),
00726                                         full_name.str());
00727               type_i++;
00728             }
00729             else {
00730               writer->writeToCurrentDir(array_x, 
00731                                         graph_col.getArray(graph_col.getIndex(major_i,minor_i,type_i)),
00732                                         0,
00733                                         full_name.str());
00734             }
00735           }
00736 
00737           if (array_x->getNDouble()>0) {
00738             n_graphs_written++;
00739           }
00740           else {
00741             n_empty_graphs_written++;
00742           }
00743         }
00744       }
00745     }
00746     else {
00747       for (UInt_t gr_i=0; gr_i<(UInt_t) graph_col.n(); gr_i++) {
00748 
00749         std::stringstream graph_name;
00750         graph_name << graph_col.getName(gr_i)
00751                    << "_"
00752                    << gr_i;
00753 
00754         EVENT::LCGenericObject *array_x=graph_col.getXArray();
00755 
00756         for (unsigned int type_i=0; type_i<graph_col.nTypes(); type_i++) {
00757           std::stringstream full_name;
00758           full_name << graph_name.str();
00759           if (!graph_col.getTypeName(type_i).empty()) {
00760             full_name  << "_"
00761                        << graph_col.getTypeName(type_i);
00762           }
00763           
00764           if (type_i+1<graph_col.nTypes() && graph_col.getTypeName(type_i+1)=="rms") {
00765             writer->writeToCurrentDir(array_x, 
00766                                       graph_col.getArray(graph_col.getIndex(gr_i,type_i)),
00767                                       graph_col.getArray(graph_col.getIndex(gr_i,type_i+1)),
00768                                       full_name.str());
00769             type_i++;
00770           }
00771           else {
00772               writer->writeToCurrentDir(array_x, 
00773                                         graph_col.getArray(graph_col.getIndex(gr_i,type_i)),
00774                                         0,
00775                                         full_name.str());
00776           }
00777         }
00778         
00779         if (array_x->getNDouble()>0) {
00780           n_graphs_written++;
00781         }
00782         else {
00783           n_empty_graphs_written++;
00784         }
00785       }
00786     }
00787 
00788     n_graphs+=graph_col.n();
00789 
00790     writer->upDir();
00791 
00792   }
00793 
00794   delete writer;
00795 
00796   if (n_histograms==0 && n_graphs==0 && n_2d_histograms==0) {
00797     std::cerr << "HistMgr::writeHistograms> WARNING: group " << group_name 
00798               << " is empty." << std::endl;
00799   }
00800 
00801   group.header().incrementVersion();
00802 
00803 }
00804 
00805 void HistMgr::listRegisteredGroups() const
00806 {  
00807   for (HistogramGroupList_t::const_iterator group_iter=_histogramGroupList.begin();
00808        group_iter!=_histogramGroupList.end();
00809        group_iter++) {
00810     const Group_t &group=(*group_iter);
00811     std::cout << group_iter.name()  << " : file=" << group.header().fileName() 
00812               << " folder=" << group.header().folderName() 
00813               << "  (version=" << group.header().version() << ")"
00814               << " / ref=" << group.header().references()
00815               << std::endl;
00816       
00817     UInt_t n_histograms=0;
00818     for (HistogramList_t::const_iterator col_iter=group._histogramList.begin();
00819          col_iter!=group._histogramList.end();
00820          col_iter++) {
00821       
00822       const HistogramCollection_t &hist_col=*(*col_iter);
00823 
00824       std::cout <<  n_histograms << " :"
00825                 << col_iter.name();
00826       if (hist_col.n()==0) {
00827         std::cout <<  " (empty)" << std::endl;
00828       }
00829       if (hist_col.is2D() && hist_col.nMajor()>=0) {
00830         UInt_t n_minor=hist_col.nMinor(0);
00831         bool number_of_minors_differ=false;
00832         for (UInt_t major_i=1; major_i<(UInt_t) hist_col.nMajor(); major_i++) {
00833           if (n_minor!=hist_col.nMinor(major_i) ) {
00834             number_of_minors_differ=true;
00835           }
00836         }
00837         if (number_of_minors_differ) {
00838           std::cout << " contains: ";
00839           for (UInt_t major_i=1; major_i<(UInt_t) hist_col.nMajor(); major_i++) {
00840             std::cout << hist_col.nMinor(major_i);
00841             if (major_i+1<hist_col.nMajor()) {
00842               std::cout << " + ";
00843             }
00844           }
00845           std::cout << "histograms." << std::endl;
00846         }
00847         else {
00848           std::cout << " contains: " << hist_col.nMajor() << " * " << n_minor << " histogramms." << std::endl;
00849         }
00850       }
00851       else {
00852         std::cout << " contains: " << hist_col.n() << " histogramms." << std::endl;
00853       }
00854       n_histograms++;
00855     }
00856   }
00857 }
00858 }
